title: Computer freezes when mic disconnects
body: When im playing league, if my mic disconnects, it freezes my whole computer. this only happens on league. Any one have any suggestions?

replies.body:
One suggestion I can point out right off the bat is to probably avoid unplugging your mic when you're playing. Your computer might be getting overwhelmed switching from using your mic to possibly another source for recording. I've seen this happen with other devices and games, mainly controllers that use a USB plug in.

Make sure your mic is firmly plugged in before starting a match, or just make sure you want your mic plugged in or not before a match to avoid this situation. 

If you need anymore assistance, just let me know! :)
